properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 12 at 5:29PM CST until January 13 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the S.F.
of the Forked Deer River at Jackson.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the S.F. of the Forked Deer River at Jackson
* from Sunday January 12 until early Monday January 13.
* At 5 PM Sunday the stage was...34.0 feet and nearing crest.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 34.0 feet on Sunday January 12.
* Flood stage is 34.0 feet.
At 34.0 feet, Businesses along Westover Road are affected by flood
waters
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
